column4: The following directions are incomplete and should not be considered a full description of what needs to be done to configure ipmasq: sudo aptitude install ipmasq
!!Yes. I got that far. Wow. Really. The docs basically consist of usefully telling you to install ipmasq. oh fail.
Please don't prefix your replies with exclamation points, it confuses ubottu
make ubottu /msg invalid trigger replies to the person - it stops channel traffic
